pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'parsnip' Engines for Survival Models // Engines for survival models from the 'parsnip' package. These include parametric models (e.g., Jackson (2016) doi:10.18637/jss.v070.i08), semi- parametric (e.g., Simon et al (2011) doi:10.18637/jss.v039.i05), and tree-based models (e.g., Buehlmann and Hothorn (2007) doi:10.1214/07-STS242).
